transcript: every type of business has downsides service businesses generate cash flow but they're really hard to scale you have to keep hiring and training people hiring and training people e-commerce they're fast to scale but they don't generate cash flow because as you scale you have to put more cash right back into marketing and you have to put it right back into inventory software is the easiest to scale but you have to frontload all the money to build the product in development and so you're usually losing money for a long time and sometimes you lose money the entire way those are like the Avenues of monetizing
